news.title: Knee-replacement implant used on thousands of NHS patients was known to be faulty for years
news.summary: Patients say they were left immobile or addicted to painkillers after receiving the NexGen implant.

news.title: US and China extend trade truce deadline to avoid tariffs hike
news.summary: On Monday, President Trump signed an executive order to continue the tariffs pause for another 90 days.

news.title: North Koreans tell BBC they are being sent to work 'like slaves' in Russia
news.summary: More than 50,000 North Koreans will be sent to work in Russia, as Moscow's war in Ukraine drains labour pools.

news.title: 'This may come as a shock but I love London' - what we learnt from Nicola Sturgeon's memoir
news.summary: The much anticipated book by the former first minister is now on sale - and the BBC's Scotland editor James Cook has been doing some speed-reading.

news.title: Taylor Swift announces 12th studio album
news.summary: The Life of a Showgirl revealed as the popstar's latest album after intense speculation from fans.

news.title: Worst bleaching on record for Western Australian coral reefs
news.summary: Scientists say the damage was caused by the "longest, largest and most intense" marine heatwave on record.

news.title: Nepal offers free climbs to 97 peaks as tourism to Everest surges
news.summary: Most tourists visiting Nepal head to Everest, which has seen overcrowding and increased pollution.

news.title: How a Red Bull can helped solve mystery of missing cyclist
news.summary: Dr Caroline Muirhead helped lead police to the spot where Tony Parsons had been buried after a confession from her boyfriend.

news.title: The Papers: 'Don't trust Putin' and 'Two weddings and a feud'
news.summary: Starmer's warning to Trump for his meeting with Putin and the Peltz-Beckham vows make Tuesday's papers.

news.title: Watch: Flames near Madrid as wildfires burn across Spain and Portugal
news.summary: Emergency crews are battling wildfires as a record-breaking heatwave continues across Europe.
